pullRequest.title: Master nb11 rest service
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
New run_plugins service. Also updated ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin.
Alternate Designs
N/A
Why Should This Be In Core?
That's where it is.
Benefits
Multiple plugins can be run at once.
Possible Drawbacks
Check with that ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin still works as expected.
Verification Process
The run_plugins service was tested using a Jupyter notebook and ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin.
ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin unit tests were run, and more were added.
Applicable Issues
N/A

commit.message: Add proper regex input to ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin; refactor some code.

New run_plugins service; ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin updated.

Multiple plugins can be run serially or in parallel. The Python
client has been updated to match.

I used ExtractWordsFromTextPlugin to test the new service,
so I updated it along the way.

nodes.bodyText: It hurts me that you have GRAPHID_PARAMETER_ID with the value graph_id...

commit.message: REST API calls now have no delay; new Sleep* plugins for testing REST calls; REST server tidying.
